thread.title: First trailer of George Clooney's 'Hail, Caesar!' unveiled
thread.title_full: First trailer of George Clooney's 'Hail, Caesar!' unveiled - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: First trailer of George Clooney's 'Hail, Caesar!' unveiled
text:
The first trailer of actor George Clooney's "Hail Caesar" has arrived.
READ: George Clooney: Amal is the smart one in our relationship
It gives an official first look at the characters played by Clooney, Josh Brolin, Scarlett Johansson, Channing Tatum, Jonah Hill, Tilda Swinton, Frances McDormand and Ralph Fiennes.
The movie centres around Eddie Mannix, a Hollywood fixer tasked with keeping the scandals of the town's biggest stars from leaking out, reports aceshowbiz.com.
Among the problems he is dealing with as teased in the trailer is the kidnapping of an A-list actor by a group called The Future.
Written and directed by Ethan and Joel Coen, Hail Caesar is an all-star comedy set during the later years of Hollywood's Golden Age.
It is scheduled for a US release on February 5, 2016.
